A

Prints out information about who has won the game
arrayParameters(String) - Static method in class TicTacToe

C

checkForWinner(Square[][]) - Static method in class TicTacToe
Checks if current player has enough adjacent markers on gameArray to complete victory conditons.

D

decThreat() - Method in class Square
Decreases squares threat by dividing it by 2
disable() - Method in class Square
sets isSelected on false

E

enable() - Method in class Square
sets isSelected on true

F

formatArray(Square[][]) - Static method in class TicTacToe
Places Square objects in array instead of NULL-value

G

getInput(Square[][]) - Static method in class TicTacToe
Reads player's input and modifies X or Y value according to desired movement

I

isSelected - Variable in class Square
if true [ ] is printed as selection marker

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class TicTacToe
Start method Game parameters are defined at the start.

O

owner - Variable in class Square
Stores the owner of Square: 0=empty 1=X 2=O

P

playerTurn - Static variable in class TicTacToe
Tracks who's turn it it
printArray(Square[][]) - Static method in class TicTacToe
Prints grid around squares and contents of every Square in gameArray

Prints graphics of Square

S

setItO() - Method in class Square
sets owner to 2
setItX() - Method in class Square
sets owner to 1
Square - Class in <Unnamed>
Square class represent one space on the gameboard.

T

threat - Variable in class Square
Stores the threat level of the Square

Increases threat value on adjacent squares of the YX-coordinates.
TicTacToe - Class in <Unnamed>

turnCPU(Square[][]) - Static method in class TicTacToe

U

W
